data.title: German food at it's best.
data.text: The food here is really good. I like the Jaeger schnitzel. The cutlet is just the right crunch. The sauce was wonderful.

data.title: Fun fun fun
data.text: The food and drinks are great!  The customer service is greater! Our group of 6 were there for almost three hours. We never felt rushed. Ordered shots food and non alcohol drinks and payed individually and every ticket was correct. I don't know how he did that but it was an awesome evening!

owner_response.author: Skay M, General Manager at Das Boot Camp Restaurant & Bar, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi pgfan4ever,

Thanks for your review!  It sounds like you had a great time and enjoyed everything.  Pleased visit us again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Horrible service, rude manager, ruined our dining experience
data.text: We went for the special burgers, but it took over an hour to get them.  While the burgers were good, the fries were cold.  A manager came by and was rude to us.  We finally got fresh fries and ate them as a second course after we had eaten the burgers.  Two in our party ordered desserts which took forever.  Then, it took a long time to get our bills.

owner_response.author: Skay M, General Manager at Das Boot Camp Restaurant & Bar, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi pearl8787,

Thanks for your review.  My apologies if your food took too long.  We always strive to deliver excellent service and deliver food in a timely manner.  I have spoken with the management about this to ensure this doesn't happen again.  I hope you will give us another try in the near future.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Place for Family to Meet
data.text: Love this place. Food is always very good. Love the homemade noodles. Great place for the family to meet for dinner.

owner_response.author: Skay M, General Manager at Das Boot Camp Restaurant & Bar, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Debra G,

Thanks for taking the time to write us a review!  We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you again in the near future.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great food great beer
data.text:
The wife and I came here for a date night and now I wonder why we've not been before.  The sausage plate appetizer was great, the jagerschnitzel was very very good, the sauerkraut was top notch, and the King's weizen is now my favorite beer.  Wow!

We will be back for sure.

owner_response.author: Skay M, General Manager at Das Boot Camp Restaurant & Bar, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Rus1974,

Thanks for your review!  I'm glad that you and your wife gave us a try and enjoyed everything so much.  We look forward to seeing you again very soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: So so German food
data.text: This restaurant is ok. The rotkuhl (red cabbage) is very good but the rest of the food is average. The beer is ok. I would not visit again.

owner_response.author: Skay M, General Manager at Das Boot Camp Restaurant & Bar, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi tcarlsonjr,

Thanks for writing us a review.  I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed our red cabbage.  I hope you will visit us again and try some our other menu items.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great beer and pretzels
data.text: Will go back, low key casual. Good beer and food. I recommend the cheese curds. Sounds bad but tastes amazing. Kids loved them

owner_response.author: Skay M, General Manager at Das Boot Camp Restaurant & Bar, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Christopher L,

Thanks for taking the time to write us a review.  I'm glad that you enjoyed our restaurant and look forward to seeing you agin very soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: This place is amazing!!
data.text: Excellent German food and the owners are so friendly...best potato soup I've ever had!! Their bratwurst and homemade sauerkraut can't be beat!

owner_response.author: Skay M, General Manager at Das Boot Camp Restaurant & Bar, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Chelsea L,

Thanks so much for your nice comments.  I'm glad you enjoyed everything and we look forward to serving you again in the near future!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Delicious
data.text: I've eaten at many German restaurants across the country and I have to say Das Boot is up there with the best.  Their prices are amazing, I've eaten German food with less flavor and smaller portions for twice the price.  It was a nice taste of comfort when traveling far from home on my birthday.  I'll definitely visit again when I'm in the area.

owner_response.author: Skay M, General Manager at Das Boot Camp Restaurant & Bar, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi tie_dyed_eyes,

I'm so glad that you enjoyed Das Boot!  We hope you will make this a regular stop when you are in the Norman area.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good Food
data.text: I got the Grilled Sausage Appetizer and I'm glad I did because I had the opportunity  to try several sausages. I also tried the sauerkraut and the spätzle. Everything was good.

owner_response.author: Skay M, General Manager at Das Boot Camp Restaurant & Bar, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Michelle R,

Thanks for the review!  It sounds like you enjoyed everything and we hope to see you again in the near future.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Happy Hour
data.text: We got into town late, but wanted to check this place out. Much to our happy surprise, it was happy hour. The $4 boots are unbeatable in price for craft brews. The kitchen was also open at the time we were there and the food truly impressed us.

owner_response.author: Skay M, General Manager at Das Boot Camp Restaurant & Bar, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi rachelanne4192,

Thanks for your review and checking our restaurant out.  I'm glad you were able to catch happy hour and take advantage of our 34 ounce boots of handcrafted beer for $4.00.  We have 2 happy hours every day, 2:00 pm to 5:00 pm and 9:00 pm to 12:00 am.  We hope to see you again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Always good!
data.text: We've always enjoyed eating at Das Boot.  Food has always been great. Employees have always been friendly. Beer on tap is great too.  Order a tasting of all the tap beers- it's fun to pick out your favorites.

owner_response.author: Skay M, General Manager at Das Boot Camp Restaurant & Bar, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi GlobeTrotta79,

Thanks for your review!  We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you agin very soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Casual German eatery!
data.text: I absolutely love their schnitzel  sandwich, which is a fried pork tenderloin. Their German potato salad is great. We also like their sauerkraut. They have beers in a variety of sizes and types. Yummy!

owner_response.author: Skay M, General Manager at Das Boot Camp Restaurant & Bar, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi fairwayBarbie,

Thanks for review!  I'm so happy that you enjoyed our Schnitzel Sandwich (one of my personal favorites) as well as the German potato salad and our sauerkraut.  We look forward to seeing you again very soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Excellent German Food
data.text:
Delicious hand made German food at an very affordable price. The beers are awesome (particularly the Kings Gold) and full flavored. Our server was Wolfgang Hans T. Schultz. He made our our visit "Gut und Spaß". The environment is family friendly and conducive to socializing (bring ear plugs, they play the music TOO loud). This eatery is a true Norman standout! Make plans to visit today!
Auf Wiedersehen!

owner_response.author: Skay M, General Manager at Das Boot Camp Restaurant & Bar, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Leonard Y,

Thanks for your recent review!  I'm pleased that you had a great experience and hope to see you again very soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Ja, das ist gutes Essen
data.text: Yes, this is good food! I had the jeagerschnitzel and spätzle--- plus a pint of beer! Excellent end to a hectic day.  The restaurant offers informal & relaxed dining experience. The restaurant was Very clean and offered excellent service.

owner_response.author: Skay M, General Manager at Das Boot Camp Restaurant & Bar, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Evecat,

Thank you for taking the time to write us a review.  It is very much appreciated!  I'm very happy that you enjoyed our restaurant so much and look forward to serving you again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: For something different
data.text: For a change of pace German food is a good option.  Went with three friends.  Each had something different and all thought food was good.

owner_response.author: Skay M, General Manager at Das Boot Camp Restaurant & Bar, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi BillB1948,

Thanks for your review!  I glad to hear that everyone in your party enjoyed their meal.  Please visit us again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Frequent Visitor
data.text: It's a busy Thursday in Norman w/ art exhibition, I just knew we'd get a table  (no offense because I'm a regular). I had the curry wrust by Shane (my favorite cook) he even stayed late to cook me my dinner I told him it tasted like the Munich train station (which is a complement ) best curry wrust I've ever had I had no doubt Shane would make it taste just as good. I LOVE Das Boot, It's a place where a half German woman feels at home & totally great full I can go to Das Boot to get a cheap (much cheaper then Germany) 1Lt beer for $4 & Great authentic German Food in Norman. I LOVE Shane the chef & the food & beer. If u live in Norman & haven't tried it u r missing out on a great experience.

owner_response.author: Skay M, General Manager at Das Boot Camp Restaurant & Bar, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Jennifer L,

Thanks so much for your recent review.  I pleased that you enjoy Das Boot so much and are a frequent visitor!  We'll see you soon I'm sure!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Food
data.text: I had one of their popular dishes.  Jagershcitzel.   It was very good with the gravy.  However, the spatzel was cold.  Told the waitress but nothing was done.  That part was disappointing.   I would definitely eat there again.

owner_response.author: Skay M, General Manager at Das Boot Camp Restaurant & Bar, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Deborah D,

Thanks so much for the review!  I glad to hear that you enjoyed your Jagerschnitzel so much.  My apologies if your spätzle wasn't hot.  We always strive to deliver exceptional food and service and this should have been fixed right away.  We look forward to seeing you again very soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Restaurant
data.text: Celebrated ourgrandson's 21st birthday here with some of the family.  A great clean, quiet place with excellent food and service.  I had the pork loin which was magnificent, with a side of German potatoe salad and kraut.  I would definitely make the trip from OKCto Norman just yo eat here!  Try it, you won't be disappointed!

owner_response.author: Skay M, General Manager at Das Boot Camp Restaurant & Bar, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Gary S,

Thanks for taking the time to write us a review.  I'm so glad you enjoyed our restaurant so much and hope your grandson had a great 21st birthday!  Please visit us again soon!!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: I love this place
data.text: I eat here often, not gonna lie I generally come during happy hour 2-5pm or 9-12, their  $4 liter boot beers 100% worth it. The beer tastes 100% German, I should know. I know the owner gets his ingredients from there.  I'm half German & go to Germany every 2 yrs & feel totally at home here. The service is excellent, the place is clean, the prices are great that's why I'm here at least twice weekly. I would tell anyone to come.

owner_response.author: Skmccall, General Manager at Das Boot Camp Restaurant & Bar, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hi Jennifer L.  Thanks so much for you nice comments and for being such a good customer!!  We really appreciate your business and look forward to serving you for years to come!
owner_response.title: Owner Response
